text: A Town Like Alice is a 1956 British Australian war drama movie directed by Jack Lee and was based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Nevil Shute. It stars Virginia McKenna, Peter Finch, Kenji Takaki, Jean Anderson, Maureen Swanson, Marie Lohr, Geoffrey Keen, Nora Nicholson, Vincent Ball. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 drama movies Category:1956 war movies Category:British war movies Category:British drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jack Lee
title: A Town Like Alice (movie)
